languages.text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.
languages.original_text: Уралон получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Вцепиться в глотку. При каждом убийстве противника в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} Уралон получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in melee combat.

Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.

Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.

languages.text: Uralon gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} A la garganta. Además, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} hasta el final del combate cada vez que mata a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}combate cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}.
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Uralon gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Carga de la doctrina de guerrero. Además, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} hasta el final del combate cada vez que mata a un enemigo en combate cuerpo a cuerpo.

languages.text: 乌拉隆获得直取咽喉{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此外，每当乌拉隆通过近战杀死敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in melee combat.

traits.locale_text: 乌拉隆获得战士信条的英勇冲锋{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此外，每当乌拉隆通过近战杀死敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}都会提高5点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Uralon acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Attaque à la gorge. De plus, il gagne 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat chaque fois qu'il élimine un ennemi en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}.
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Uralon acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Charge de la doctrine du Combattant. De plus, il bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat chaque fois qu'il élimine un ennemi en mêlée.

languages.text: Uralon erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} An die Kehle gehen. Zusätzlich erhält er jedes Mal, wenn er einen Feind im Nahkampf tötet, bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Uralon erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Ansturm der Kämpfer-Doktrin. Zusätzlich erlangt er jedes Mal, wenn er einen Feind im Nahkampf tötet, bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.

languages.text: ウラロンは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}の突撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。さらに彼は、{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}戦闘で敵を殺害した場合、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}+5を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat.

traits.locale_text: ウラロンはファイタードクトリンの突撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。さらに彼は、近接戦闘で敵を殺害した場合、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g} +5を獲得する。

languages.text: Уралон получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Вцепиться в глотку. При каждом убийстве противника в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} Уралон получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Уралон получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} бойца Рывок. При каждом убийстве противника в ближнем бою Уралон получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} до конца боя.

Уралон получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} бойца Рывок. При каждом убийстве противника в ближнем бою Уралон получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} до конца боя.

languages.text: Uralon, Gırtlağına Çök {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüşte{/g} her düşman öldürdüğünde +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Uralon gains the Go for the Throat {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Additionally, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} until the end of combat each time he kills an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee combat{/g}.
